metadata.description: Production-tested plugins for Claude Code - 58 plugins organizing 169 skills for Cloudflare, AI, React, Tailwind v4, and modern web development

plugins.name: aceternity-ui
plugins.description: Production-ready aceternity-ui development. Use for building with aceternity-ui.

plugins.name: ai-tools
plugins.description: AI development tools: Vercel AI SDK (core & UI), ElevenLabs Agents, Multi-AI Consultant, and Thesys Generative UI. Use for building AI applications, streaming interfaces, voice agents, and generative UI.

plugins.name: api
plugins.description: Complete API development: design principles, error handling, filtering/sorting, gateway configuration, pagination, rate limiting, documentation, optimization, testing, versioning, changelog, contract testing, and REST design. Use for building robust REST APIs with proper patterns, security, and documentation.

plugins.name: app-store-deployment
plugins.description: Production-ready app-store-deployment development. Use for building with app-store-deployment.

plugins.name: architecture
plugins.description: Software architecture: patterns, microservices patterns, and technical specifications. Use for architectural design, system design, and technical documentation.

plugins.name: auth
plugins.description: Authentication and authorization: Better Auth, Clerk, OAuth, session management, and API authentication. Use for implementing user authentication, authorization, SSO, and secure sessions.

plugins.name: claude

plugins.name: cloudflare
plugins.description: Complete Cloudflare platform ecosystem: Workers, D1 database, R2 storage, KV, Queues, Durable Objects, Workers AI, Vectorize, Workflows, Agents, Turnstile, Hyperdrive, Images, Browser Rendering, Zero Trust, and full-stack integrations. Use for building serverless applications, edge computing, distributed systems, AI at the edge, and Cloudflare deployments.
